Class ArticleSummaryDto

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.DTOs.Article
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Lightweight Data Transfer Object for article list views (cards, grids, summaries). Contains only the essential fields needed for displaying article previews.

public class ArticleSummaryDto
Inheritance
object

Inherited Members

object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)

Remarks

This DTO is optimized for performance in list views, containing only the fields necessary for rendering article cards, titles, and basic metadata.

Used in:

  • Feed article lists
  • Search results
  • Tag-filtered views
  • Unread/Starred/Favorite collections
